results.title: Alcohol
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Single Concept Drug Films”.
This film shows alcohol as a mood changing substance. It shows the effects of different levels of alcohol consumption, which can lead to coma and death in extreme cases. The film stresses that decisions to use alcohol are best left to the informed individual. Suitable for secondary and tertiary levels.

results.title: Sedatives
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Single Concept Drug Films”

One of a series of drug films which explains the uses of sedatives and effects on the individual’s personality. Looks at tolerance and physical and psychological dependence.

results.title: Volatile substances
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Single Concept Drug Films”
Informational film on the hazards associated with the abuse of common domestic and industrial chemicals: solvents, aerosol propellants, and anaesthetics. Alludes briefly to the injury which can result from the toxicity of these chemicals - permanent impairment of motor function and acute organ pathology. Directed more towards adult caregivers than the children and adolescents who are more likely to abuse these substances.

results.title: Stimulants
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Single Concept Drug Films”.
One of a series of drug films which is concerned with the effects of stimulants on the nervous system. Shows the results of use of these drugs, and mentions the “speed freak”.

results.title: Marijuana
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Single Concept Drug Films”.
Explains the sources and effects of marihuana on the individual personality, admitting that science has not yet fully researched the drug.

results.title: Albury: year round holiday centre
results.brief_description: A look at Albury, holiday and convention city, and its surrounding resorts. Shows the numerous amenities they can offer to the tourist or visitor. Points of interest seen are Lake Hume, Beechworth and its historic buildings and Mount Beauty and skiing at Falls Creek. No further credits available.

results.title: Albert Gleizes
results.creator_credit: Pierre Alibert and Les Films du Cypres
results.brief_description: Presents the painter who, early in his career, began experimenting with structure to rediscover form, which eventually led to Cubism. Successive treatments of one subject painted by Gleizes are compared in their cubistic development and the laws of painting, which Gleizes defined, are demonstrated through examples in his own work.
